extendedInfo.description: PULPHOTEL is the best hotel, hostel & apartment search engine / price comparison application available for Android devices.Need a hotel to stay but you're not the couch-surfing type? Pulphotel is the app that lets you Search for the perfect hotel wherever you're staying. Compare hotel prices and choose your check-in date, check-out date, guests, and rooms. This app supports multiple currencies and languages including: English, Danske, Deutsch, EspaÃ±ol, franÃ§aise, Italiano, Nederlands, Norske, polonÃªs, portuguÃªs, ÄeÅ¡tina, Romana, Svenska, TÃ¼rkÃ§e, ÎÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÎ¬, Ð ÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, ×¢××¨××ª, Ø§ÙØ¹Ø±Ø¨ÙØ© , íêµ­ì´, æ¥æ¬è¯­, ç®ä½ ä¸­æ, ç¹ä½ ä¸­æ ...making this the perfect app to take with you no matter your preferred language.Pulphotel searches for all the available prices of virtually every hotel in the world. Just choose the hotel you want and the app will show you where you can book your stay at the lowest price. The powerful search engine allows you find hotels with special features like and make the perfect booking: Admission of pets, Disabled Access, Parking, Non-Smoking Rooms, Pool, Restaurant, Fitness Room / Gym, airport transfers and a very long list.The system uses an extensive database that includes not only hundreds of thousands of hotels but is also updated daily with new, hostels, apartments, lodging ...Save money and sleep well with Pulphotel on your Android device.Main Features:* All available price of (almost) any hotel you choose.* It compares more than 150 travel agencies (booking, expedia, Hotels.com, Travelocity, Lastminute.com, Easytobook.com, Intercontinental, Ratestogo , Accorhotels, Laterooms.com, Skoosh...)* Travellers' opinions.* Interactive situation maps.* Hotel pictures.* Hotel feature list, description...* Light speed engine.* COMPLETELY FREE!...All in just 145 kb!Look for hotel budgets with your pc/mac:http://www.pulphotel.com
